background: A federal agency needs to process sensitive citizen data across multiple departments. The solution must implement a secure data pipeline that includes data ingestion, processing, and storage while maintaining FedRAMP High compliance requirements. The infrastructure must support real-time data processing with strict access controls and audit capabilities.
fixes_applied: Updated deprecated S3 resources to non-deprecated versions
Fixed environment suffix handling in tap.py
Added proper stack outputs for integration testing
Ensured all resources use environment_suffix for naming
